property.name: text
property.value: Storage Tank: Perform fuel transfer to collector tank if needed

property.name: text
property.value: Storage Tank: Perform fuel transfer to collector tank if needed

property.name: text
property.value: When the fuel level in Tank1 decreases below 50, Tank3 transfers fuel to Tank1. Tank3 can be removed during simulation. This is detected in the Cockpit and a mode change is performed. In the target mode Tank2 transfers fuel to Tank1.

property.name: text
property.value: This is a discrete event model of an avionics fuel control system. Actors in this model are highly connected. To avoid displaying all the relations between actors, this model uses the WirelessDirector. Note that the WirelessDirector is a subclass of the DEDirector. Communication is done through special network components (Bus) which are derived from the AtomicWirelessChannel. Ports have a parameter outsideChannel which specifies the Bus they are connected to. The parameter 'receiver' in an output port specifies the target port.

property.name: text
property.value: - transfer fuel from tank A to tank B - dump fuel in emergency

property.name: text
property.value: This model expects interleaved events from the sensor and clock inputs. If it receives a second clock input since the last sensor input, it outputs a "missed" event. Upon receiving the first sensor input since the last clock, it outputs an "ok" event. It is fine for the sensor and clock inputs to be simultaneous, as long there is one sensor event for each clock event.

property.name: text
property.value: This FSM assumes missed and ok inputs are never simultaneously present.

property.name: text
property.value: - add fuel from other tank - move fuel to other tank

property.name: text
property.value: - add fuel from other tank - move fuel to other tank
